conversations.content:
I'll be arriving in London on March 15th. Last year, I stayed at the 'London Luxury Hotel', which had amazing reviews and ratings. It was super quiet and clean, and my room had a view of the Thames River. It was such a great experience! This time, I want to try out a new hotel. Once I figure out which one is the best, I'll head there and then find a good restaurant to eat at with my friends.
I have a budget of 160 for the hotel, and I want to stay in a hotel with the highest rating. Can you recommend a hotel? Tell me the name, rating, price range, and address. Thanks a bunch!

<function_thought>
To assist Emma with her hotel inquiry, I will first gather information about available hotels in London. After retrieving the hotel information, I'll check for hotels within her budget of £160. I will prioritize hotels with the highest ratings and then obtain their ratings, price ranges, and addresses. 
The next step is to execute the first function in the trajectory, which is to get all hotels in London.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_hotels_in_city(city="London")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Hotel Names: Cozy Stay
Mom's Home
London Luxury
Covent Garden Retreat
Riverside View

<function_thought>
I have retrieved a list of hotels in London: "Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", and "Riverside View". Next, I will check the prices for these hotels to determine which ones fall within Emma's budget of £160.
The next step is to execute the function to get the prices for the retrieved hotels.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_hotels_prices(hotel_names=["Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", "Riverside View"])]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The price ranges for the hotels are as follows:

- London Luxury: £80.0 - £150.0
- Covent Garden Retreat: £80.0 - £150.0
- Riverside View: £200.0 - £350.0

Since Emma's budget is £160, all hotels except "Riverside View" fit within her budget. The next step is to retrieve the ratings and reviews for the hotels that are within the budget to determine which one has the highest rating.
